title: Boards in a Nutshell.
body:
I tried to create an informative thread backed up with actual sources. Then this happened. 

[Me In The Center](http://imgur.com/a/dNoFr)

Basically I've Come to Understand serveral things about the boards from reading through it for the first time in years.

1. Flame Riot--This company has only made ~~one of~~ THE most successful online game in the world. To make a post popular you just need to rant on the forums to express you hatred at this company  ~~since you are hardstuck in low elo since you are a noob that sucks at video games~~ for screwing up the game and nerfing your favorite champions and making other onese overpowered as fuck and hard to play against.

2. Hate specific champions--A very original thread topic. You must express you hatred towards specific champions, to confirm you are not ~~the only noob~~ skilled player that is experiencing feelings of frustration towards specific champions. It doesn't matter that you are the 10th of 12th person to make a thread about why you hate all the meta sheep that are playing vladimir nonstop and losing or players that annoy you by outplaying you on shaco because ~~you don't understand how he even works~~ of how overpowered he is, what truly matters is that you create a hate thread towards a champion and have others support your hate so you can try to reach out to Riot and clearly convince them something is unbalanced ~~even though you are just a bronze player and balance is geared toward platinum and above~~.

3. Opinions>Statistics--Statistics don't matter at all. What matters is how you feel and statistics should only come into play when they support your opinions. Jhin, Lucian and Ezreal are obviously the best adc's! I see them every game!!!! Other adc's like twitch are balanced because all he does is ~~become almost undetectable for 14 seconds and delete entire enemy teams with his ultimate~~ auto attack and press e. No way jhin has a 48% win rate!!! He is so broken, which is why I play him all the time!!! I lose because ~~I suck at league~~ I get bad teams!!!

4. It's Full of Kids--There's supposed to be an age limit of 13 for playing league but I for certain can say a lot of people here don't even have the mental maturity of a 10 year old. I'm going to count all the downvotes to get an accurate statistic on the population of 12 year olds on this forums.

Sorry if you are a low-elo scrub and you disagree with me because you are obviously so much better than league at me and know so much more.
